nodes.text: Escape Plan JGT-HB was a contingency escape plan created by Cylo, a traitor of the Galactic Empire. When the Imperial I-class Star Destroyer Devastator found Cylo's fleet in the Crushank Nebulae, Cylo ordered Morit Astarte to prepare Escape Plan JGT-HB, before reconsidering and electing Escape Plan JGT-HB-4 instead.
Escape Plan JGT-HB was first mentioned in Darth Vader 21, a 2016 comic book written by Kieron Gillen.
